posts.title: Zhifu
posts.excerpt: Quote:Economic unrest roils central China’s Shaanxi Province: local factories are merging, thugs threaten managers, personnel records get lost, and workers are without protections such as health insurance. The police and much of society are surly. Xiao Jian, a mild young man whose father is ill, works in the family street stall doing pressing and tailoring. …

posts._title: Lucille Carra – The Inland Sea [+ Extras] (1991)
posts.title: The Inland Sea
posts.excerpt: Quote:In 1971, author and film scholar Donald Richie published a poetic travelogue about his explorations of the islands of Japan’s Inland Sea, recording his search for traces of a traditional way of life as well as his own journey of self-discovery. Twenty years later, filmmaker Lucille Carra undertook a parallel trip inspired by Richie’s by-then-classic …

posts._title: Maurice Tourneur – The Wishing Ring: An Idyll of Old England (1914)
posts.title: The Wishing Ring: An Idyll of Old England
posts.excerpt: AMG wrote:According to film historian William K. Everson, to offer a fully detailed synopsis of Maurice Tourneur’s delightful period piece The Wishing Ring “would do a disservice to its charm.” Suffice to say that the film’s wide-eyed heroine Vivian Martin comes into possession of a ring which she believes to have magical powers. Armed with …

posts.title: The Hitler Gang
posts.excerpt: John Farrow’s true-to-life propaganda history of the resistible rise of A Hitler. Der Fuhrer is played by lookalike Bobby Watson, and his “gang” are an unbeatable group of WWII era refugee German actors, all inhabiting their roles rather convincingly. Martin Kosleck is a superb Goebbels.

posts._title: Jean-François Davy – Les pornocrates AKA The Porno Kings (1976)
posts.title: Les pornocrates
posts.excerpt: This is a documentary on the 70’s French porn industry. There are generally two kinds of porn documentaries–those that actually take an insightful look behind the scenes, and those that are just an excuse to show a lot of nudity and XXX porn footage. This is actually somewhere in between. It’s generously seasoned with porn …

posts._title: Alan Parker – Come See the Paradise (1990) (HD)
posts.title: Come See the Paradise (1990)
posts.excerpt: Portraying one of the shadier details of American history, this is the story of Jack McGurn, who comes to Los Angeles in 1936. He gets a job at a movie theatre in Little Tokyo and falls in love with the boss’s daughter, Lily Kawamura. When her father finds out, he is fired and forbidden ever …

posts.title: Angel Heart (1987)
posts.excerpt: New York, 1955, Private Detective Harry Angel has a new case on his hands. Washed up crooner Johnny Favourite has gone missing. Witnesses, informants and anybody who might be holding clues are being murdered one by one. Angel is being kept awake at night by strange satanic visions and before long he suddenly finds himself …

posts._title: Santiago Loza – Breve historia del planeta verde AKA Brief Story from the Green Planet (2019)
posts.title: Breve historia del planeta verde
posts.excerpt: Quote:In director Santiago Loza’s Teddy Award winner (Best Feature Film 2019), young trans woman Tania is tasked with caring for her recently deceased grandmother’s closest companion — an alien, whom she and her comrades must safely return to its origins. As the group makes the journey on foot, Tania finds herself supernaturally linked with her …

posts._title: Mohamed Malas – Al-lail AKA The Night (1992)
posts.title: Al-lail
posts.excerpt: Quote:The Night or Al-Lail (Arabic: الليل‎) (The Night) is a Syrian feature drama film by director Mohamed Malas. The film explores the Arab-Israeli conflict as seen through the experiences of an Arab family in newly liberated city of Quneitra, headed by a resistance fighter. Al-Lail was the first Syrian feature to be played at the …

posts._title: Patrick Wang – A Bread Factory, Part One (2018) (HD)
posts.title: A Bread Factory, Part One (2018)
posts.excerpt: SynopsisAfter 40 years of running their community arts space, The Bread Factory, Dorothea and Greta are suddenly fighting for survival when a celebrity couple–performance artists from China–come to Checkford and build an enormous complex down the street catapulting big changes in their small town.
